Name: Shining Aria
Desc4: When the equipper hits an enemy with <color=#FFFFFF>[Basic Attack]</color>, their Anomaly Proficiency increases by 36 points for 8 seconds, repeated triggers reset the duration; when enemies on the field become Stunned, the equipper's DMG increases by 25% for 18 seconds, repeated triggers reset the duration.
Story: The first album released after "Angels of Delusion" was formed had an energetic and lively style, but sales were minimal. As a commemorative master copy, fan-written cheer phrases were added after the lyrics.
